snippet: Inspired by other parts of Polynesia that have obtained political autonomy or are seeking independence, leaders of the Rapanui people are mounting a rebellion against Chile.
abstract: Leaders of the Rapanui people, inspired by other parts of Polynesia that have obtained political autonomy or are seeking independence, are mounting a slow-burning rebellion against Chile for possession of their native Easter Island.

byline.contributor: Aaron Nelsen contributed reporting from Santiago, Chile.

lead_paragraph: Inspired by other parts of Polynesia that have obtained political autonomy or are seeking independence, leaders of the Rapanui people are mounting a rebellion against Chile.

headline.seo: Slow-Burning Rebellion Against Chile on Easter Island
headline.main: Slow-Burning Challenge to Chile on Easter Island
headline.print_headline: Slow-Burning Challenge To Chile on Easter Island
